EmailTemplate.name: Pivotal IT Comm.DK - Amended Accessing Accounts Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Accessing Pivotal accounts from your Personal Device - Fixed Link
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
To All Pivotal Employees,
The link to our official MDM policy was broken in my previous message. To view the policy, please use this link <https://docs.google.com/a/pivotal.io/document/d/1HYGdNqK6LjbgawGOSSDSMm1D6lBSzRzo3NMW4tRgLHE> instead.
Best, Drew
